message: The result: a $2.5 million dollar donation to one of South Florida’s leading organizations fighting human trafficking, St. Thomas University’s Human Trafficking Academy. Miami is a hub for human trafficking. The region is consistently topping state lists for number of victims, and Florida itself ranks as one of the worst states in the country in terms of human trafficking victims.

data.description: John Brunetti, owner of the Hialeah Park race track, donated $2.5 million to St. Thomas University’s Human Trafficking Academy, which offers training, research and counseling. The new funds will…
data.title: The movie ‘Taken’ inspired a $2.5 million donation to fight human trafficking
